title: Crime Alert 02.01.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 02.01.21
description:
Ambulance stolen during a call. The thief is found in a drive-through with the lights going. Georgia teen steals thousands from his grocery employer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
